sections.title: Frequently Asked **Questions**
sections.description: Common questions about our services and process

faqs.question: How long does a typical AI implementation project take?
faqs.answer: Project timelines vary based on scope and complexity. Our **Discover** phase typically takes 2-4 weeks, **Design** takes 3-6 weeks, **Deploy** takes 4-12 weeks, and **Operate** is ongoing. We'll provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.

faqs.question: Do you work with companies of all sizes?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with organizations ranging from mid-market companies to large enterprises. Our solutions are scalable and can be tailored to fit your organization's size, budget, and requirements.

faqs.question: What industries do you specialize in?
faqs.answer: We have deep expertise in **Aviation**, **Healthcare**, **Financial Services**, and **Public Sector**. However, our frameworks and methodologies are applicable across many industries.

faqs.question: How do you ensure compliance with AI regulations?
faqs.answer: We are **ISO 42001 certified** and stay current with evolving AI regulations including the EU AI Act, NIST AI RMF, and industry-specific requirements. Compliance is built into every solution we deliver.

faqs.question: What kind of ongoing support do you provide?
faqs.answer: We offer comprehensive ongoing support including performance monitoring, system optimization, compliance maintenance, and regular updates. Our **Operate** phase ensures your AI systems continue to deliver value over time.

faqs.question: Can you integrate with our existing systems?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in enterprise integration with ERP, CRM, and other business systems. Our solutions are designed to work within your existing technology ecosystem.
